Header.Info: Performance Monitoring Events for Intel(R) Xeon(R) Processor - V1.00

Events.BriefDescription: Fixed Counter: Counts the number of instructions retired.
Events.PublicDescription: Fixed Counter: Counts the number of instructions retired.

Events.BriefDescription: Fixed Counter: Counts the number of unhalted core clock cycles.
Events.PublicDescription: Fixed Counter: Counts the number of unhalted core clock cycles.

Events.BriefDescription: Fixed Counter: Counts the number of unhalted core clock cycles.
Events.PublicDescription: Fixed Counter: Counts the number of unhalted core clock cycles.

Events.BriefDescription: Fixed Counter: Counts the number of unhalted reference clock cycles.
Events.PublicDescription: Fixed Counter: Counts the number of unhalted reference clock cycles.

Events.BriefDescription: Fixed Counter: Counts the number of issue slots that were not consumed by the backend because allocation is stalled due to a mispredicted jump or a machine clear.
Events.PublicDescription: Fixed Counter: Counts the number of issue slots that were not consumed by the backend because allocation is stalled due to a mispredicted jump or a machine clear.

Events.BriefDescription: Fixed Counter: Counts the number of retirement slots not consumed due to front end stalls.
Events.PublicDescription: Fixed Counter: Counts the number of retirement slots not consumed due to front end stalls.

Events.BriefDescription: Fixed Counter: Counts the number of consumed retirement slots.
Events.PublicDescription: Fixed Counter: Counts the number of consumed retirement slots.

Events.BriefDescription: Counts the number of page walks completed due to load DTLB misses to any page size.
Events.PublicDescription: Counts the number of page walks completed due to loads (including SW prefetches) whose address translations missed in all Translation Lookaside Buffer (TLB) levels and were mapped to any page size. Includes page walks that page fault.

Events.BriefDescription: Counts the number of cacheable memory requests that miss in the LLC. Counts on a per core basis.
Events.PublicDescription: Counts the number of cacheable memory requests that miss in the Last Level Cache (LLC). Requests include demand loads, reads for ownership (RFO), instruction fetches and L1 HW prefetches. If the core has access to an L3 cache, the LLC is the L3 cache, otherwise it is the L2 cache. Counts on a per core basis.

Events.BriefDescription: Counts the number of cacheable memory requests that access the LLC. Counts on a per core basis.
Events.PublicDescription: Counts the number of cacheable memory requests that access the Last Level Cache (LLC). Requests include demand loads, reads for ownership (RFO), instruction fetches and L1 HW prefetches. If the core has access to an L3 cache, the LLC is the L3 cache, otherwise it is the L2 cache. Counts on a per core basis.

Events.BriefDescription: Counts the number of unhalted core clock cycles. [This event is alias to CPU_CLK_UNHALTED.THREAD_P]
Events.PublicDescription: Counts the number of unhalted core clock cycles. [This event is alias to CPU_CLK_UNHALTED.THREAD_P]

Events.BriefDescription: Counts the number of unhalted core clock cycles. [This event is alias to CPU_CLK_UNHALTED.CORE_P]
Events.PublicDescription: Counts the number of unhalted core clock cycles. [This event is alias to CPU_CLK_UNHALTED.CORE_P]

Events.BriefDescription: Counts the number of unhalted reference clock cycles at TSC frequency.
Events.PublicDescription: Counts the number of reference cycles that the core is not in a halt state. The core enters the halt state when it is running the HLT instruction. This event is not affected by core frequency changes and increments at a fixed frequency that is also used for the Time Stamp Counter (TSC). This event uses a programmable general purpose performance counter.

Events.BriefDescription: Counts the number of page walks completed due to store DTLB misses to any page size.
Events.PublicDescription: Counts the number of page walks completed due to stores whose address translations missed in all Translation Lookaside Buffer (TLB) levels and were mapped to any page size.  Includes page walks that page fault.

Events.BriefDescription: Counts every time the code stream enters into a new cache line by walking sequential from the previous line or being redirected by a jump and the instruction cache registers bytes are not present. -
Events.PublicDescription: Counts every time the code stream enters into a new cache line by walking sequential from the previous line or being redirected by a jump and the instruction cache registers bytes are not present. -

Events.BriefDescription: Counts every time the code stream enters into a new cache line by walking sequential from the previous line or being redirected by a jump.
Events.PublicDescription: Counts every time the code stream enters into a new cache line by walking sequential from the previous line or being redirected by a jump.

Events.BriefDescription: Counts the number of page walks completed due to instruction fetch misses to any page size.
Events.PublicDescription: Counts the number of page walks completed due to instruction fetches whose address translations missed in all Translation Lookaside Buffer (TLB) levels and were mapped to any page size.  Includes page walks that page fault.

Events.BriefDescription: Counts the number of retirement slots not consumed due to backend stalls. [This event is alias to TOPDOWN_BE_BOUND.ALL]
Events.PublicDescription: Counts the number of retirement slots not consumed due to backend stalls. [This event is alias to TOPDOWN_BE_BOUND.ALL]

Events.BriefDescription: Counts the number of retirement slots not consumed due to backend stalls. [This event is alias to TOPDOWN_BE_BOUND.ALL_P]
Events.PublicDescription: Counts the number of retirement slots not consumed due to backend stalls. [This event is alias to TOPDOWN_BE_BOUND.ALL_P]

Events.BriefDescription: Counts the number of instructions retired.
Events.PublicDescription: Counts the number of instructions retired.

Events.BriefDescription: Counts the total number of branch instructions retired for all branch types.
Events.PublicDescription: Counts the total number of instructions in which the instruction pointer (IP) of the processor is resteered due to a branch instruction and the branch instruction successfully retires.  All branch type instructions are accounted for.

Events.BriefDescription: Counts the total number of mispredicted branch instructions retired for all branch types.
Events.PublicDescription: Counts the total number of mispredicted branch instructions retired.  All branch type instructions are accounted for.  Prediction of the branch target address enables the processor to begin executing instructions before the non-speculative execution path is known. The branch prediction unit (BPU) predicts the target address based on the instruction pointer (IP) of the branch and on the execution path through which execution reached this IP.    A branch misprediction occurs when the prediction is wrong, and results in discarding all instructions executed in the speculative path and re-fetching from the correct path.

Events.BriefDescription: Counts the number of tagged load uops retired that exceed the latency threshold defined in MEC_CR_PEBS_LD_LAT_THRESHOLD - Only counts with PEBS enabled.
Events.PublicDescription: Counts the number of tagged load uops retired that exceed the latency threshold defined in MEC_CR_PEBS_LD_LAT_THRESHOLD - Only counts with PEBS enabled.

Events.BriefDescription: Counts the number of tagged load uops retired that exceed the latency threshold defined in MEC_CR_PEBS_LD_LAT_THRESHOLD - Only counts with PEBS enabled.
Events.PublicDescription: Counts the number of tagged load uops retired that exceed the latency threshold defined in MEC_CR_PEBS_LD_LAT_THRESHOLD - Only counts with PEBS enabled.

Events.BriefDescription: Counts the number of tagged load uops retired that exceed the latency threshold defined in MEC_CR_PEBS_LD_LAT_THRESHOLD - Only counts with PEBS enabled.
Events.PublicDescription: Counts the number of tagged load uops retired that exceed the latency threshold defined in MEC_CR_PEBS_LD_LAT_THRESHOLD - Only counts with PEBS enabled.

Events.BriefDescription: Counts the number of tagged load uops retired that exceed the latency threshold defined in MEC_CR_PEBS_LD_LAT_THRESHOLD - Only counts with PEBS enabled.
Events.PublicDescription: Counts the number of tagged load uops retired that exceed the latency threshold defined in MEC_CR_PEBS_LD_LAT_THRESHOLD - Only counts with PEBS enabled.

Events.BriefDescription: Counts the number of tagged load uops retired that exceed the latency threshold defined in MEC_CR_PEBS_LD_LAT_THRESHOLD - Only counts with PEBS enabled.
Events.PublicDescription: Counts the number of tagged load uops retired that exceed the latency threshold defined in MEC_CR_PEBS_LD_LAT_THRESHOLD - Only counts with PEBS enabled.

Events.PublicDescription: Counts the number of tagged load uops retired that exceed the latency threshold defined in MEC_CR_PEBS_LD_LAT_THRESHOLD - Only counts with PEBS enabled.

Events.BriefDescription: Counts the number of tagged load uops retired that exceed the latency threshold defined in MEC_CR_PEBS_LD_LAT_THRESHOLD - Only counts with PEBS enabled.
Events.PublicDescription: Counts the number of tagged load uops retired that exceed the latency threshold defined in MEC_CR_PEBS_LD_LAT_THRESHOLD - Only counts with PEBS enabled.

Events.BriefDescription: Counts the number of tagged load uops retired that exceed the latency threshold defined in MEC_CR_PEBS_LD_LAT_THRESHOLD - Only counts with PEBS enabled.
Events.PublicDescription: Counts the number of tagged load uops retired that exceed the latency threshold defined in MEC_CR_PEBS_LD_LAT_THRESHOLD - Only counts with PEBS enabled.

Events.BriefDescription: Counts the number of tagged load uops retired that exceed the latency threshold defined in MEC_CR_PEBS_LD_LAT_THRESHOLD - Only counts with PEBS enabled.
Events.PublicDescription: Counts the number of tagged load uops retired that exceed the latency threshold defined in MEC_CR_PEBS_LD_LAT_THRESHOLD - Only counts with PEBS enabled.

Events.BriefDescription: Counts the number of tagged load uops retired that exceed the latency threshold defined in MEC_CR_PEBS_LD_LAT_THRESHOLD - Only counts with PEBS enabled.
Events.PublicDescription: Counts the number of tagged load uops retired that exceed the latency threshold defined in MEC_CR_PEBS_LD_LAT_THRESHOLD - Only counts with PEBS enabled.

Events.BriefDescription: Counts the number of  stores uops retired same as MEM_UOPS_RETIRED.ALL_STORES
Events.PublicDescription: Counts the number of  stores uops retired same as MEM_UOPS_RETIRED.ALL_STORES

Events.BriefDescription: Counts the number of load ops retired.
Events.PublicDescription: Counts the number of load ops retired.

Events.BriefDescription: Counts the number of store ops retired.
Events.PublicDescription: Counts the number of store ops retired.

Events.BriefDescription: Counts demand data reads that have any type of response.
Events.PublicDescription: Counts demand data reads that have any type of response.

Events.BriefDescription: Counts demand data reads that were not supplied by the L3 cache.
Events.PublicDescription: Counts demand data reads that were not supplied by the L3 cache.

Events.BriefDescription: Counts demand read for ownership (RFO) requests and software prefetches for exclusive ownership (PREFETCHW) that have any type of response.
Events.PublicDescription: Counts demand read for ownership (RFO) requests and software prefetches for exclusive ownership (PREFETCHW) that have any type of response.

Events.BriefDescription: Counts demand read for ownership (RFO) requests and software prefetches for exclusive ownership (PREFETCHW) that were not supplied by the L3 cache.
Events.PublicDescription: Counts demand read for ownership (RFO) requests and software prefetches for exclusive ownership (PREFETCHW) that were not supplied by the L3 cache.
